#include<stdio.h>
#define GETCHAR getchar_unlocked()

int getint()
{
	int i = 0;
	char c = 0;
	while (c<33)
	c = GETCHAR;
	while (c > 33) {
		i = i * 10 + c - '0';
		c = GETCHAR;
	}
	return i;
}

int a[22][22], r, c;

int issafe()
{
	int i, j;
	for(i = 0; i < r; i++)
		for(j = 0; j < c; j++) {
			if(a[i][j] >= 4)
				return 1;
		}
	return 0;
}

int main()
{
	int t, x, y, n, i, j;
	t = getint();
	while(t--) {
		r = getint();
		c = getint();
		for(i = 0; i < r; i++)
			for(j = 0; j < c; j++)
				a[i][j] = getint();
				
		n = getint();
		
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			x = getint();
			y = getint();
			a[x][y]++;
		}
		
	while(issafe()) {
		for(i = 0; i < r; i++)
			for(j = 0; j < c; j++) {
				if(a[i][j] >= 4) {
					if(i - 1 >= 0)
						a[i-1][j]++;
					if(i + 1 < r)
						a[i+1][j]++;
					if(j - 1 >= 0)
						a[i][j-1]++;
					if(j + 1 < c)
						a[i][j+1]++;
					a[i][j] -= 4;
				}
			}
	}
	
	for(i = 0; i < r; i++) {
		for(j = 0;j < c; j++) {	
			printf("%d ", a[i][j]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
}
	return 0;
}
